scripts.container-run-command: yarn run scriptManager shouldCompileScript=true @deployment/deploymentScript " .container.run.runApplication({ scriptCommand: ' node --eval \"  require(process.cwd()).application({}, { memgraph: { host: \'memgraph\' }}) \"  '}) "
scripts.livereload-configuredForContainer: yarn run scriptManager shouldCompileScript=true @deployment/deploymentScript ".run.default({ application: [{},{ memgraph: { host: 'memgraph' }}] })"
scripts.test: yarn run scriptManager shouldCompileScript=true @deployment/deploymentScript ".test.default({ testPath: ['./test'], shouldDebugger: false, shouldCompileTest: true })"
scripts.test-inspect: export NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect-brk' && yarn run scriptManager @deployment/deploymentScript ".test.default({ testPath: ['./test'], shouldDebugger: true, shouldCompileTest: true })"
